briefTitle: Welchol as Monotherapy for Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change in Hemoglobin A1c
outcomeMeasures.description: change in HbA1c from baseline to Week 24

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Plasma Glucose
outcomeMeasures.description: to determine changes in Glycemic control after 24 weeks on therapy

outcomeMeasures.title: % Subjects With a Decrease in HbA1c of >= 0.7 Percentage Units
outcomeMeasures.description: to determine the percentage of participants who experience a reduction in HbA1c of at least 0.7 percentage units at 24 weeks from baseline.

outcomeMeasures.title: % Subjects Achieving an HbA1C Goal of <7.0
outcomeMeasures.description: % Subjects achieving an HbA1C goal of \<7.0 at 24 weeks

outcomeMeasures.title: % Subjects With a Decrease in FPG >=30 mg/dL
outcomeMeasures.description: % Subjects with a decrease in Fasting Plasma Glucose \>=30 mg/dL from baseline to 24 weeks

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Total Cholesterol [TC]
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in total cholesterol \[TC\]

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Low Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol [LDL-C]
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in low density lipoprotein cholesterol \[LDL-C\]

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in High Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol [HDL-C]
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in high density lipoprotein cholesterol \[HDL-C\]

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Non-HDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in non-HDL-C

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Triglycerides [TG]
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in triglycerides \[TG\]

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Apolipoprotein A-I (apoA-I)
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in apolipoprotein A-I (apoA-I)

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in Apolipoprotein B (apoB)
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the effects of Welchol on changes in apolipoprotein B (apoB)

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Postprandial Plasma Glucose, 2 Hours After a Meal Tolerance Test
outcomeMeasures.description: To assess the change from baseline on postprandial plasma glucose, 2 hours after a meal tolerance test
